title: Azir Global VO Bug
body: When in a match with {{champion:268}} on my team, I constantly heard him say "Trust my vision" constantly throughout the match without much reasoning or anything, seems to just be a random voice bug. Decided I should report it.

replies.body:
Heya Total Mastermind! 

Thanks for taking the time to report this! We're aware of the issue and are looking into it. It looks like there may be other champions affected by global ward placement VO. D:
